text: i had seen HPI but not promnesia somehow—it’s definitely up my alley!

elements.text: i had seen HPI but not promnesia somehow—it’s definitely up my alley!

text:
Better queries in Promnesia is something that I'd love to have/add :) Currently it's only simple search, mainly because I didn't want to reinvent the wheel.
Ideally there would be an existing JS component which allows to interact with an sqlite database (so it'd have autocomplete/pagination/etc).
Regarding "full text search on pages you have open" -- TabFs <https://omar.website/tabfs> might approximate it

attachments.title: TabFS
attachments.text: A browser extension that mounts your browser tabs as a filesystem on your computer.

attachments.title: fizzbuzz in Python using random, how does it work?
attachments.text: I am having a hard time figuring out how the code below works: import random for i in range(0, 100): if not i % 15: random.seed(1178741599) print [i+1, "Fizz", "Buzz", "FizzBuzz"][
attachments.fallback: Stack Overflow: fizzbuzz in Python using random, how does it work?
